title: Research Limitation: API Usage Caps Reached
description: Unable to collect AI coding insights from thought leaders and sources due to web search and web reader API reaching monthly usage limits. Both tools return error code 1308 indicating usage cap will reset on January 1, 2026. This affects all planned data sources including: Andrej Karpathy, Simon Willison, Amjad Masad, Lex Fridman Podcast, YouTube channels (Two Minute Papers, Fireship, AI Explained), podcasts (The Changelog, Software Engineering Daily), tech media (TechCrunch, The Verge, MIT Technology Review), technical platforms (Papers with Code, ArXiv, Towards Data Science), and community platforms (Hacker News, Reddit). This highlights a limitation in automated research workflows that depend on third-party API services with usage quotas.
author: System Analysis
